definitions.text: manner of acting or controlling yourself
(behavioral attributes) the way a person behaves toward other people
direct the course of; manage or control
examples: You cannot conduct business like this

definitions.text: lead, as in the performance of a composition
examples: conduct an orchestra; Barenboim conducted the Chicago symphony for years
They conducted themselves well during these difficult times
We lead him to our chief
can you take me to the main entrance?
He conducted us to the palace

definitions.text: transmit or serve as the medium for transmission
lead musicians in the performance of
examples: Bernstein conducted Mahler like no other conductor
